Articles.Content: From time to time, it's nice to say thanks. I've always enjoyed tinkering around with KSP, and the forums are amazing. Thanks for the answers, advice and talents. Keep it up.

Thank you eh! You are also welcome!

And thank you for letting me post, eh.

And thank you Squad/a great team for a great game eh!

And thank you forum dwellers for the support of KSP eh!

And thank you moderators for keeping bad forum dwellers in line eh!

And sorry if I took up too much room for this post eh, but thanks eh!

Edited October 4, 2014 by SpenSpaceCorp
I want to say thanks to the amazing community as well, it's so much better than most other game forums.

http://fc04.deviantart.net/fs71/f/2013/162/4/a/kerbal_canada_ksp_by_niegelvonwolf-d68oi03.png

I want to say thanks to the amazing community as well, it's so much better than most other game forums.

We need flags for all the countries with the KSP logo on them, like HOCGamings's Union Jeb.

also, your welcome, even though I gave no advice!

I agree. Awesome community. It's how the game grows.

Way happy to support the group.
